channel.title: Guide to Joining a ham server please
channel.description: (If this is in the wrong section can u move it and tell me where it has been moved plz lol ;)) Anyway, can some one post a guide how to get on hamachi servers because everytime i try it always messes up and im really confussed now.. :confused: ^^^^^ please ^^^ STILL^^^ HELP%^^%^%

item.title: Guide to Joining a ham server please
item.dc:creator: @Evangelion Evangelion
item.description:
@Evangelion wrote:

First open your hamachi

Second click on the triangle

Third click Join Existing Server

Fourth Type in ham username and pass
ex. Username:EvangelionScape Pass:123 (All Names Are Case Sensitive)

Finally hit join and have fun =)

Read full topic
